findings.title: Block Gas Limit in massUpdatePools() Function
findings.description: The massUpdatePools() function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: User rewards not minted when Lucky reaches capitalization, but dev rewards are minted.
findings.description: When Lucky reaches capitalization, user rewards are not minted, whereas developer rewards are minted.

findings.title: Contracts contain interfaces that are not audited.
findings.description: The contracts contain interfaces that have not been audited, which may pose a security risk.

findings.title: Owner can change migrator.
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to change the migrator, which could lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change dev address.
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to change the developer's address.

findings.title: Owner can transfer ownership.
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to transfer ownership, which could lead to unintended consequences if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner can change luckyPerBlock
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to modify the 'luckyPerBlock' variable.
